title: The Dean's List
description: Kevin’s first semester of college didn’t go as planned. He’d become a wild little gay slut, and his grades had suffered. But his loving boyfriend had a plan to get Kevin’s life back on track. But could Kevin resist the allure of hot sex and refocus on his studies?  The second book in the 'Talented Boys' series by noted eroticist John Shepherd, The Dean's List is a work of erotic gay fiction and includes graphic descriptions of very hot gay sex.
author: John  Shepherd
